name: Transport Titans
title: Leading in Transport Services Exports
description: In 2023, Mozambique's transport services accounted for 76.91% of its service exports, marking it as a global leader in this sector.

name: Debt Dilemma
title: High External Debt Burden
description: Mozambique's external debt stocks reached 349.68% of its GNI in 2023, highlighting a significant financial challenge.

name: Employee Expense Enthusiasts
title: High Compensation of Employees
description: In 2022, 62.02% of Mozambique's expenses were allocated to employee compensation, indicating a focus on workforce remuneration.

name: Customs Conundrum
title: Lengthy Customs Clearance
description: In 2018, it took an average of 39.3 days to clear exports through customs in Mozambique, suggesting room for improvement in efficiency.

name: Primary Education Pioneers
title: High Male Enrollment in Primary Education
description: With a gross intake ratio of 173.88% for males in 2018, Mozambique shows a strong commitment to primary education.

name: Poverty Predicament
title: Low Income for Bottom 40%
description: In 2019, the bottom 40% of Mozambique's population had a daily income of just $0.74, highlighting economic disparities.

name: Income Inequality Insight
title: Low Average Income
description: The total population's average daily income was $2.30 in 2019, indicating widespread economic challenges.

name: Aging Anomaly
title: Low Male Population Aged 60-64
description: In 2023, only 1.00% of Mozambique's male population was aged 60-64, suggesting demographic shifts.

name: Voice Variety
title: Diverse Sources of Voice and Accountability
description: With 14 sources in 2023, Mozambique demonstrates a diverse range of voices in governance and accountability.
